text: Chilandanyo cha achinakunaku pakwanyenga Ayuda ŵalukosyo lwa Nadhîr ya kumpitikuchila Muhammadi (ﷺ chili chisawu shetani ndema jaŵansalile mundu kuti: “Munkanani (Allah).” Basi ndema ja ŵakanile, (shetani) jwatite: “Chisimu une ndalikangene namwe, unetu ngun'jogopa Allah M’mbuje jwa iwumbe yosope.”
